ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity is a valid SOAP POST GetCapabilities request with the optional Sections element, using SOAP version 1.2 encoding; 2. the value of the Sections element contains one Section element with a text value of Themes
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS client can issue a SOAP POST GetCapabilities request containing the optional Sections element with a Section element with a text value of Themes.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.Sections.Themes not tested.
Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.Sections.Themes test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.Sections.Multiple
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity is a valid SOAP POST GetCapabilities request with the optional Sections element, using SOAP version 1.2 encoding; 2. the value of the Sections element contains one Section element with a text value of Contents and a second one with a value of Themes
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS client can issue a SOAP POST GetCapabilities request containing the optional Sections element with two Section elements with different text values, i.e. Contents and Themes.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.Sections.Multiple not tested.
Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.Sections.Multiple test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.UpdateSequence
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity is a valid SOAP POST GetCapabilities request with the optional Sections element, using SOAP version 1.2 encoding; 2. the value of the updateSequence element text is an integer, a timestamp in [ISO 8601:2000] format, or any other number or (non-empty) string.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS client can issue a SOAP POST GetCapabilities request containing the optional updateSequence element with a valid value.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.UpdateSequence not tested.
Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.UpdateSequence test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.AcceptFormats
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity is a valid SOAP POST GetCapabilities request with the optional AcceptFormats element, using SOAP version 1.2 encoding; 2. the value of the AcceptFormats element contains a prioritized sequence of zero or more OutputFormat elements containing valid MIME type response formats desired by client, with preferred formats listed first.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS client can issue a SOAP POST GetCapabilities request containing the optional AcceptFormats element containing one or more OutputFormat elements with valid value(s).

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.AcceptFormats not tested.
Client.SOAP.POST.GetCapabilities.AcceptFormats test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.

ctl:test.name: wmts:Client.RESTful.GetCapabilities.Mandatory
ctl:test.ctl:param: Bootstrap prerequisites test result for this test - true or false
This test was selected for execution - true or false
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: 1. the request entity is a valid RESTful GetCapabilities request invoking the ServiceMetadataURL for a complete Service Metadata document advertised by a WMTS server.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test that a WMTS client can issue a RESTful GetCapabilities request for a complete ServiceMetadata document.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Client.RESTful.GetCapabilities.Mandatory not tested.
Client.RESTful.GetCapabilities.Mandatory test skipped because its prerequisites were not met.
